TC_2.1.description: Validate that user can successfully add any item which is available in index.html page into own cart
TC_2.1.author: Anoja

TC_2.2.description: Validate that user can successfully add 2nd item into own cart after 1st item add
TC_2.2.author: Anoja

TC_2.3.description: Validate that user can successfully add all items available in Inventory Page into own cart
TC_2.3.author: Anoja

TC_2.4.description: Validate that user successfully remove added item from cart by clicking remove button of added product
TC_2.4.author: Anoja

TC_2.5.description: Validate that user successfully remove one item from added items in user's cart by clicking remove button displayed
TC_2.5.author: Anoja

TC_2.6.description: Validate that user successfully remove all item from added items in user's cart by clicking remove button displayed
TC_2.6.author: Anoja

TC_2.7.description: Validate that user successfully add item to cart by following below flow. Click on selected Item image >>  Click on Add to cart button >> Click on Back to Products Link.
TC_2.7.author: Anoja

TC_2.8.description:
Validate that user successfully add item  and remove same item from cart by following below flow. 

Click on selected Item image >>  Click on Add to cart button >>Click on Remove button >> Click on Back to Products Link
TC_2.8.author: Anoja

TC_2.9.description: Validate that user successfully add item to cart by following below flow. Click on selected Item name >>  Click on Add to cart button >> Click on Back to Products Link
TC_2.9.author: Anoja

TC_2.10.description: Validate that application products displaying  default method is Name(A to Z)
TC_2.10.author: Anoja

TC_2.11.description: Validate that user sort/filter products From Z to A by Name
TC_2.11.author: Anoja

TC_2.12.description: Validate that user sort/filter products From A to Z by Name
TC_2.12.author: Anoja

TC_2.13.description: Validate that user sort/filter products From Low to High price
TC_2.13.author: Anoja

TC_2.14.description: Validate that user sort/filter products From High to Low price
TC_2.14.author: Anoja
